alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Southern Carroll (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 9:40PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect southwestern Oxford... southwestern Androscoggin...Cumberland and northeastern Carroll Counties... At 937 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was near Naples... moving south AT 25 MPH. Locations impacted include... Conway, Bridgton, Fryeburg, Naples, Cumberland, Gorham, Falmouth, Freeport, Gray, Hiram, Cornish, Raymond, Yarmouth, Standish, Harpswell, Durham, Casco, Limington, Bartlett and Harrison. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 between mile markers 12 and 23. Interstate 95 between mile markers 54 and 73. This also includes... Sebago Lake, Pleasant Mountain, Burnt Meadow Mountains, Long Lake, and Kearsarge North . Cousins Island. * A quick coating of snow may accumulate in this area of heavy snow showers. Travel is not advised during these heavy snow showers. Rapid visibility reduction and potentially icy roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the snow showers pass your location. If traveling pull off to a safe location.
